subject: Q3 Budget Review Meeting - Action Items Required
body:
Hi Alex,

Following up on yesterday's Q3 budget review meeting, here are the action items we discussed for the Marketing department:

1. Provide detailed breakdown of digital advertising spend by platform
2. Submit revised Q4 budget projections with 8% reduction
3. Justify headcount increase request for social media specialist

Please have these items completed by August 9th so we can finalize budget allocations before the board meeting on August 12th.

Let me know if you need any clarification on the requirements.

Best,
Jennifer Williams
Finance Manager
